title: If there is a small amount of impurity in my pants and I overwhelm it with water, is it pure? assim
transcript: Jenna from India Jenna from India Asam Alik I wanted to ask if there's a small amount of Nas in my Pand and then if I overwhelm it with water is it considered PK as long as you wash it off and the essence of this NASA has been removed through overwhelming it with water and squeezing it and cleaning it yes it is considered uh uh pure inshallah
